EmailTemplate.name: 2016Q4.Global.NUR.2130.XLE Finance.Email 4 - The bank branch of the future
EmailTemplate.subject: A look into the bank branch of the future
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> What is the future of bank branches? Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Shifting consumer behaviour, technological advances and digitization. The bank branch of the future will both; look considerably different than it does today, and play a significantly different role in the bank’s strategy.
Read our latest white paper: The bank branch of the future, for insights on key market challenges, what’s coming to the branch and how you can start building the branch of the future. If you would like to have a Nokia representative contact you, please click here <[[https://networks.nokia.com/how-to-buy]]>.
I hope you enjoy the read.
Michael Williams Financial Services Manager, Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia Connect with us © 2017 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
